data.name: Despair: Blood Curse
data.detailed_description:
October 19, 1918

Dear Anna,

I don't have much time.
Mother is dead.
Lillian is not to be trusted.
She never sleeps. She never eats.
She’s coming for me next.
Just promise me one thing.
No matter what happens,

DON’T COME HOME.

Your sister,
Catherine

Key Features

Join Anna in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place at her family's home. Will she be able to save her sister before it's too late and uncover Lillian's true intentions?

  • Use Anna's axegun to defeat enemies from a distance or up-close.
  • Non-linear gameplay. Explore and solve puzzles to unlock the mysteries of the mansion and beyond.
  • Limited inventory space. Carefully manage your inventory while always being ready for the unknown.
  • A location-based damage system. Don't waste precious ammo shooting arms and legs. Aim for the head.

data.short_description: A third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. After the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place. Will she save her sister before it's too late?
